plot: A clumsy girl sets out for a day of hoops, only to be upstaged by a 99-year old basketball whiz who brings new meaning to "old school".
title: Grandma Shoots, Grandma Scores
plot_es: A clumsy girl sets out for a day of hoops, only to be upstaged by a 99-year old basketball whiz who brings new meaning to "old school".
plot_en: A clumsy girl sets out for a day of hoops, only to be upstaged by a 99-year old basketball whiz who brings new meaning to "old school".
